Html:
Hi,

It seems a little weird to align the terminology with nodejs but not with .net.

It's not just Node.js, it's JavaScript generally. Modules are part of the ECMAScript 6 proposed spec.

On Oct 9, 2012 3:31 PM, "lnaie" <notifications@codeplex.com> wrote:

They are different things. Why call them the same?
